Agency: U.S. Attorney-Northern District of New York

Description: The University of Rochester Medical Center agreed to pay $3 million to the HHS Office for Civil Rights and take substantial corrective action to settle potential violations of the Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act (HIPAA) Privacy and Security Rules.
Agency: Health & Human Services Department Office for Civil Rights

Company: UNIVERSITY OF ROCHESTER STRONG MEMORIAL HOSPITAL
Info Source: Extracted from a download of OSHA's Enforcment Data downloaded on 3/02/2022, available at https://enforcedata.dol.gov/views/data_catalogs.php
